welcome_message_body: Welcome to Iwaki, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful coastline, delicious seafood, and rich history. We invite you to explore all that Iwaki has to offer and enjoy your time here.

restaurants.name: BREAK
restaurants.description: BREAK is a café located in いわき市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fukushima Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fukushima Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
